reviewText: My 3 & 1 year old loved it! Along with every other Wild Kratt episode they've ever seen, lol. My only wish is that there were episodes per disc, we're starting to get quite a collection of individual DVDs.

This DVD features two Wild Kratts episodes "Koala Balloon" and "Kickin' it with the Roos" plus a bonus called "Platypus Cafe." My kids love Wild Kratts and even though they have seen these episodes before they love watching them over and over. I love how the show features both animated parts and then shows the real Kratt brothers with real animals. This DVD is all about kangaroos and koalas and if you have a child who likes those animals then they will especially like this DVD.

I received this dvd to review in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.

There are only 2 episodes on this DVD.
Koala Balloon
Kickin' it with the Roos
The Kratt bros adventures are so fun to watch. This is a show the whole family, ages 1-38, can enjoy
I got these Dvds in record time!!!! I got them for my daughter for Christmas and She Loved them!!!! Thank You Very Much!!!!:-)
My kids are crazy for the Wild Kratts!
